footer.description: Attoly allows creating short links as aliases for long URLs, which are easier to embed in websites, chats and documents. Stop using URLs that are far too long and prone to errors and get your personal Attoly Shortcut now.

jumbotron.title: Possibility to simplify your <highlight>URL sharing</highlight>
jumbotron.description: Attoly allows creating short links as aliases for long URLs, which are easier to embed in websites, chats and documents. Stop using URLs that are far too long and prone to errors and get your personal Attoly Shortcut now.

construction-notification.title: Attention, Excavators! üöß
construction-notification.description: This site and the associated services are originally a pure learning project. The construction of our platform is therefore not yet final and is progressing steadily.

feature-show.title: A better way to short links
feature-show.description: Create short links in seconds and share them across all the platforms you use. See what we offer you:

managament.title: Easy Link Management
managament.description: An easy-to-use application to manage all your shortcuts and content. You are in control of everything down to the smallest detail.

qrcode.title: Generate QR-Codes
qrcode.description: In addition to a short link, you can also conveniently generate a QR code that can be shared around the world and linked directly to your content.

compatibility.title: Device Compatibility
compatibility.description: Our service works across devices. Thanks to our responsive-first approach, this applies in particular to our management portal and our website.

prices.title: Free Usage
prices.description: Thanks to our open source commitment and funding through advertising, we can offer our service completely free of charge.

cookie-banner.title: Allow cookies! üç™
cookie-banner.description: We use cookies and browser memory to give you the best experience on our website. Enable cookies to use the website. For details see <hyperlink>privacy policy</hyperlink>.
cookie-banner.deny: I don't want to see this anymore

change-user-password-form.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
change-user-password-form.success: The password has been changed successfully.
change-user-password-form.title: Change password
change-user-password-form.description: Change your account password. The new password will take effect the next time you log in.

delete-current-user-form.title: Delete account
delete-current-user-form.description: This will permanently delete your account. You will lose all your data and will no longer be able to access your account.

delete-current-user-dialog.title: Delete account
delete-current-user-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
delete-current-user-dialog.disclaimer: The account will initially only be deactivated, so it will no longer be possible to log in. This happens instantly. Within 30 days, the account will then be irrevocably deleted with all associated shortcuts and payment options as well as account details.
delete-current-user-dialog.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!

current-user-shortcut-list.title: My shortcuts
current-user-shortcut-list.description: The following shortcuts are currently available in your account. You can manage them here.
current-user-shortcut-list.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
current-user-shortcut-list.no-shortcuts: You have not created any shortcuts yet. Create your first shortcut now.

delete-shortcut-dialog.title: Delete shortcut
delete-shortcut-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this shortcut? This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
delete-shortcut-dialog.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!

shortcut-list.title: Shortcuts
shortcut-list.description: The following shortcuts are currently available on the whole platform. You can manage them here.
shortcut-list.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
shortcut-list.no-shortcuts: No shortcuts have been created yet or none are found.

user-list.title: Users
user-list.description: The following users are registered on the whole platform. You can manage them here.
user-list.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
user-list.no-users: No users have been registered yet or none are found.
user-list.disclaimer: This is highly personal data. Note our <privacy-policy-link>privacy policy</privacy-policy-link> and internal guidelines.

delete-user-dialog.title: Delete user
delete-user-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
delete-user-dialog.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!

manage-user-roles-dialog.title: Manage roles
manage-user-roles-dialog.description: Here you can manage the roles of the user. The roles are used to grant the user access to certain areas of the application.
manage-user-roles-dialog.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
manage-user-roles-dialog.no-roles: The user has no roles assigned yet.

create-complaint-dialog.title: File a complaint
create-complaint-dialog.description: Here you have the opportunity to report inappropriate shortcuts. The complaint will then be processed by an admin.
create-complaint-dialog.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!

login.title: Login
login.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
login.credentials-error: Either username or password are wrong!
login.disabled-error: The account is disabled, please verify your E-Mail and activate your account.
login.locked-error: The account is locked, you can't log in at the moment!
login.headline: Sign in into your account

register.title: Register
register.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
register.success: The user account has been created successfully. To activate the account, follow the instructions in the email that will be sent to you.
register.headline: Create your new account
register.usage-terms-notice: By clicking "Register" you agree to our <terms-hyperlink>Terms of Use</terms-hyperlink> and our <privacy-hyperlink>Privacy Policy</privacy-hyperlink>.

logout.title: Logout
logout.headline: Hope to see you soon.
logout.description: You have been logged out. To log in again click <hyperlink>here</hyperlink>.

not-found.headline: Oops! Page not found.
not-found.description: The page you are looking for was not found. You may return to <hyperlink>home page</hyperlink>.

redirect.title: Redirect
redirect.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
redirect.headline: Getting redirected...
redirect.description: Please note that we cannot accept any liability for the content of third parties. Links can always lead you to potentially unwanted content. We try to remove such links as best we can. In the end, however, the creator of the link you follow is liable and not our platform.

reset-password.title: Reset Password
reset-password.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
reset-password.expiry-error: The reset password link has expired!
reset-password.unknown-email-error: No account could be found with this email.
reset-password.email-sent-success: The email with the reset link was sent successfully.
reset-password.reset-success: The password has been reset successfully.
reset-password.headline: Reset your account password
reset-password.description: Have you forgotten your password and you can no longer log in? No problem. Get an email with a link to reset your password.

verify-user.title: Verify User
verify-user.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
verify-user.unknown-email-error: No account could be found with this email.
verify-user.email-sent-success: The email with the verification link was sent successfully.
verify-user.verify-success: The user has been verified successfully.
verify-user.headline: Verify your account
verify-user.description: If the original e-mail with the link to verify the user did not arrive, or the link has already expired, a new e-mail can be sent here. Then follow the instructions in the email to activate the account.

get-started.title: Get Started
get-started.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
get-started.request-headline: Paste the URL to be shortened
get-started.usage-terms-notice: By clicking "Generate shortcut" you agree to our <terms-hyperlink>Terms of Use</terms-hyperlink> and our <privacy-hyperlink>Privacy Policy</privacy-hyperlink>.
get-started.expiry-notice: You are not logged in. Your shortcuts will therefore expire after some time and will be removed. To change this click <hyperlink>here</hyperlink>.

oauth2-redirect.title: Login Redirect
oauth2-redirect.error: An unexpected error occurred, please retry!
